text: The 3rd and the Mortal is an Norwegian rock band formed in 1992. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Tears Laid in Earth (1994) * Painting on Glass (1996) * In This Room (1997) * Memoirs (2002) ==References== Category:Doom metal bands Category:Progressive metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 1992 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2005
title: The 3rd and the Mortal
